scripts.ui:build:ts: npx tsc src/ui/*.ts --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --outDir src/ui/dist
scripts.ui:build:bundle: cat src/ui/dist/types.js src/ui/dist/SessionComponent.js src/ui/dist/ToolsComponent.js src/ui/dist/DebugComponent.js src/ui/dist/ChatComponent.js src/ui/dist/ChatApp.js > src/ui/dist/chat.js
scripts.ui:build: npm run ui:build:ts && npm run ui:build:bundle && npm run ui:build:scss && cp src/ui/index.html src/ui/dist/index.html
